name: client_name
description: This is the name of the client associated with the contract

name: client_address
description: This is the address of the client

name: project_name
description: This is the name of the project associated with the contract

name: start_date
description: This is the start date of the contract or project

name: end_date
description: This is the end date of the contract or project

name: payment_terms
description: This field contains the terms of payment for the contract

name: line_items
description: This field contains the details of items or services billed in the invoice

name: sub_total
description: This is the subtotal amount before taxes and other fees

name: tax_amount
description: This is the total tax amount applied to the invoice

name: total_amount
description: This is the total amount of the invoice, including taxes and fees

name: status
description: This field represents the current status of the invoice (e.g., paid, unpaid, overdue)

name: authorized_by
description: This is the name of the person who authorized the invoice

name: payment_received
description: This field indicates if the payment has been received

name: remaining_balance
description: This is the remaining balance to be paid for the invoice

name: comments
description: This field contains any additional comments or notes for the invoice

name: attachments
description: This field contains any attached documents related to the invoice
